title: Take Me On and On
lyrics:
The stars that shine so brightly
They call to me
I dream of how it might be
Somewhere far away
Chorus: Take me on and on

Until the world has gone

Take me on and on



The chains that hold you

Those chains will soon be gone

Sail upon the ocean

Sail back to me



Chorus



Take me on, on and on

I see it all below

I know which way to go

I see the afterglow



Chorus
